data.Sentence: --- Lesson 91  Three men in a basket

data.Sentence_cn: 一个飞行员发现了一只气球，它像是正飞往附近的一个皇家空军基地。
data.Sentence: A pilot noticed a balloon which seemed to be making for a Royal Air Force Station nearby.

data.Sentence_cn: 他马上把情况报告了该基地，但那里的人没有一个能解释这到底是怎么回事。
data.Sentence: He informed the station at once, but no one there was able to explain the mystery.

data.Sentence_cn: 控制塔上的官员得知这一消息后，非常气愤，因为气球有可能给飞机造成极大的危险。
data.Sentence: The officer in the control tower was very angry when he heard the news, because balloons can be a great danger to aircraft.

data.Sentence_cn: 他说可能有人正对基地进行侦察，因此命令那个飞行员跟踪那个奇怪的飞行物。
data.Sentence: He said that someone might be spying on the station and the pilot was ordered to keep track of the strange object.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞行员设法绕着气球飞了一阵。
data.Sentence: The pilot managed to circle the balloon for some time.

data.Sentence_cn: 他看清了气球下面有3个人呆在一只筐里，其中一个举着望远镜。
data.Sentence: He could make out three men in a basket under it and one of them was holding a pair of binoculars.

data.Sentence_cn: 当气球飞临基地上空时，飞行员看见有一个人在拍照。
data.Sentence: When the balloon was over the station, the pilot saw one of the men taking photographs.

data.Sentence_cn: 不久，气球开始降落，在一个停机坪附近着了陆。
data.Sentence: Soon afterwards, the balloon began to descend and it landed near an airfield.

data.Sentence_cn: 警察被召来了，但他们却不能逮捕任何人，
data.Sentence: The police were called in, but they could not arrest anyone,

data.Sentence_cn: 因为筐里是两名国会议员和一名基地的指挥官！
data.Sentence: for the basket contained two Members of Parliament and the Commanding Officer of the station!

data.Sentence_cn: 正如指挥官后来解释的那样，基地的这半边不知道那半边正在干什么！
data.Sentence: As the Commanding Officer explained later, one half of the station did not know what the other half was doing!
